segments.text: From where I'm standing, I can see the entire kitchen layout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area is on the right, with cabinets lining the walls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is facing away, focused on her dish towel task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbelievably, the sink is overflowing with water gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle that's spreading across the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are near the open cabinet, sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down into the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits patiently, her little hand extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, labeled clearly for all to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is serene with neat bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad that this peaceful view contrasts the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the woman; she's missing all the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears if not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
